original_text: All rivers pour water into the sea, but the sea does not become full. The water returns to the rivers and it all happens again. All rivers pour water into the sea, but the sea does not become full. The water returns to the rivers and it all happens again. All rivers pour water into the sea, but the sea does not become full.
korean_text: 모든 강물은 다 바다로 흐르되 바다를 채우지 못하며 강물은 어느 곳으로 흐르든지 그리로 연하여 흐르느니라

sentences.original_text: All rivers pour water into the sea
but the sea does not become full
The water returns to the rivers

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 모든 것이 다시 반복됩니다

sentences.original_text: All rivers pour water into the sea
but the sea does not become full
The water returns to the rivers

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 모든 것이 다시 반복됩니다
